entry.title: Dev Log 0.0
entry.content:
0.0

Commit

Trying out new front matter settings including “categories”, “tags”，”img” etc.
Comment feature (Gitalk) requires permanent domain url to obtain clientID and clientSecret (in _config.yml under themes). Resolve in future time.
Uploaded some user pics. hexo deploy may or may not complete this task. git push to main.
Changed reward pic to some random pic. Modify file name in _config.yml under themes to change in future.
Music feature enabled and custom playlist loaded. VIP access required. Unresolved.
Post front matter edited. Set up Dev log with ver num. To be continued.
Note: don’t change url under _config.yml outside theme. Alter after domain changed to permanent.

To do list for 0.1 ver__:

  • search feature
  • math formula
  • code module
  • continue on finishing page layout

entry.title: Work Manual
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
